attributes.action: Vote for an early general election to be held in May 2016.
attributes.additional_details: Vote no confidence in David Cameron - http://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471
attributes.background: Over 192,000 people have signed a petition calling for a vote of no confidence in David Cameron, yet the government have refused to act on this. Early elections can be called In extreme circumstances, including a vote of no confidence. We are now asking for the publics opinion to be respected.
